law.catch_line: Condition of bonds of state officers -- Ex officio liability.
law.text: Each bond provided for in KRS 62.160 shall be a covenant to the Commonwealth of Kentucky that the principal will faithfully discharge his duties and will faithfully account for and pay over all money and property that may come into his possession by virtue of his office or position. Liability on the bond of any officer shall extend to any position held by him ex officio.
law.history: Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 2, effective May 18, 1956. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 3.
